name: One Night At Doge's 2
description:
Restart the game after death.

Wait 2 seconds for the game to load. Doge goes to the bathroom then the ducts, shut off the ducts, but not for too long. Fan goes to the vent, shut it when you hear his audio clue. Dabbing Chica goes through dining room then into your office, put on your mask when you see or hear her audio clue. Baby Yoda goes to the bathroom then your office, put on your mask when you see or hear his audio clue.
